26 #ifndef TILEDARRAY_TILE_OP_SCAL_H__INCLUDED
27 #define TILEDARRAY_TILE_OP_SCAL_H__INCLUDED
28 
29 #include <TiledArray/tile_op/tile_interface.h>
30 #include <type_traits>
31 #include "../tile_interface/scale.h"
32 
33 namespace TiledArray {
34 namespace detail {
35 
37 
45 template <typename Result, typename Arg, typename Scalar, bool Consumable>
46 class Scal {
47  public:
48  typedef Scal<Result, Arg, Scalar, Consumable> Scal_;
49  typedef Arg argument_type;
50  typedef Scalar scalar_type;
51  typedef Result result_type;
52 
53  static constexpr bool is_consumable =
54  Consumable && std::is_same<result_type, argument_type>::value;
55 
56  private:
57  scalar_type factor_;
58 
59  // Permuting tile evaluation function
60  // These operations cannot consume the argument tile since this operation
61  // requires temporary storage space.
62 
63  result_type eval(const Arg& arg, const Permutation& perm) const {
64  using TiledArray::scale;
65  return scale(arg, factor_, perm);
66  }
67 
68  // Non-permuting tile evaluation functions
69  // The compiler will select the correct functions based on the
70  // consumability of the arguments.
71 
72  template <bool C, typename std::enable_if<!C>::type* = nullptr>
73  result_type eval(const argument_type& arg) const {
74  using TiledArray::scale;
75  return scale(arg, factor_);
76  }
77 
78  template <bool C, typename std::enable_if<C>::type* = nullptr>
79  result_type eval(argument_type& arg) const {
80  using TiledArray::scale_to;
81  return scale_to(arg, factor_);
82  }
83 
84  public:
85  // Compiler generated functions
86  Scal(const Scal_&) = default;
87  Scal(Scal_&&) = default;
88  ~Scal() = default;
89  Scal_& operator=(const Scal_&) = default;
90  Scal_& operator=(Scal_&&) = default;
91 
93 
96  explicit Scal(const scalar_type factor) : factor_(factor) {}
97 
99 
103  result_type operator()(const argument_type& arg,
104  const Permutation& perm) const {
105  return eval(arg, perm);
106  }
107 
109 
113  template <typename A>
114  result_type operator()(A&& arg) const {
115  return Scal_::template eval<is_consumable>(std::forward<A>(arg));
116  }
117 
119 
122  result_type consume(argument_type& arg) const {
123  constexpr bool can_consume =
124  is_consumable_tile<argument_type>::value &&
125  std::is_same<result_type, argument_type>::value;
126  return Scal_::template eval<can_consume>(arg);
127  }
128 
129 }; // class Scal
130 
131 } // namespace detail
132 } // namespace TiledArray
133 
134 #endif // TILEDARRAY_TILE_OP_SCAL_H__INCLUDED
